params.nullifierHash: The nullifier hash for this proof, preventing double signaling (returned by the IDKit widget).
params.proof: The zero-knowledge proof that demonstrates the claimer is registered with World ID (returned by the IDKit widget).
params.root: The root (returned by the IDKit widget).
params.signal: An arbitrary input from the user, usually the user's wallet address
